data.name: The Plague Doctor of Wippra
data.detailed_description:
Experience a working day as plague doctor Oswald Keller in medieval Germany. Make diagnoses and help your patients with medical prescriptions or surgery. Stand up against misbeliefs and deal with the ignorance of the people. It is not without danger, but it is the only way to find out the cause of the "Black Death".



The Plague Doctor of Wippra is a short point-and-click adventure filled with medical puzzles, interisting characters, historical knowledge and a gripping story. Hand-drawn in beautiful pixel art, expect captivating gameply in a historical yet contemporary setting.

Features

  • A moody medieval setting with believable characters
  • Thick atmosphere and great storytelling
  • Gorgeous painterly low-res pixelart
  • Puzzles with actual historical and medical context
  • Dialogues which matters
  • The feeling of a retro adventure with streamlined controls
  • Contains no bad jokes

data.short_description: The plague spreads fear and agony in the small town of Wippra. As a doctor, you help where you can. Then medieval superstition and religious zeal mix into a deadly threat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Metal capable
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04, CentOS 7 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
